body.p: Changes the name of a procedural language.

section.title: Synopsis
section.codeblock: ALTER LANGUAGE name RENAME TO newname ALTER LANGUAGE name OWNER TO new_owner

section.title: Description
section.p: ALTER LANGUAGE changes the definition of a procedural language for a specific database. Definition changes supported include renaming the language or assigning a new owner. You must be superuser or the owner of the language to use ALTER LANGUAGE.

plentry.pd: The new name of the language.
The new owner of the language.

section.title: Compatibility
section.p: There is no ALTER LANGUAGE statement in the SQL standard.
